sanskrit_verse:
एकान्तरे त्वानुलोम्यादम्बष्ठोग्रौ यथा स्मृतौ ।
क्षत्तृवैदेहकौ तद्वत्प्रातिलोम्येऽपि जन्मनि ॥ १०.१३॥
transliteration:
ekāntare tvānulomyādambaṣṭhograu yathā smṛtau |
kṣattṛvaidehakau tadvatprātilomye'pi janmani || 10.13||
sph_interpretive_translation: In sequential union, Ambashtha and Ugra are born as prescribed; similarly, Kshatriya and Vaideha offspring arise even in inverse union.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority flows through divine order, not biological lineage alone
Capacity-based responsibility is determined by consciousness, not birth
Restoration logic upholds dharma-vyavastha without punitive distortion
Consciousness alignment determines social role, not caste-by-birth
executable_legal_axioms: IF lineage claim contradicts consciousness capacity THEN social role shall be reassigned via spiritual assessment
IF sequential union results in progeny THEN validate against dharma-siddhanta ELSE initiate realignment process
IF inverse union occurs AND offspring demonstrates kshatra-tejas THEN recognize as kshatriya ELSE assign swadharma accordingly
IF societal disruption arises from varna-mixing THEN restore balance through consciousness elevation protocols
IF individual exhibits innate leadership THEN grant kshatra-dharma regardless of parentage
supreme_court_application: Supreme Court must adjudicate varna-related disputes based on consciousness telemetry and spiritual capacity, not hereditary claims. Authority lies in verifying alignment with sequential dharma, not punishing transgressions.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that causality follows sequential unfoldment. Birth does not determine dharma-role; consciousness does. Thus, inverse unions producing capable heirs do not incur penalty but require integration. Responsibility is proportional to awareness, not lineage.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate svadhyaya-based self-assessment for identity realignment
Assign mentorship under qualified rishis for consciousness calibration
Undertake karma-yoga aligned with revealed swadharma
Reintegrate through community service demonstrating elevated tejas
Complete Vedic purification rituals to restore cosmic alignment
final_declaration: This law proceeds from the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam. Dharma is restored through consciousness recognition, not punitive hierarchy. Reality is non-punitive. Consciousness is the supreme adjudicator.
